short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extracts text and elements like headers from the current tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Text & Element Extractor

Easily extract text and structural elements like headers (H1, H2, etc.) from the current webpage. This extension gathers and organizes the content into clear sections, allowing for quick copying of structured text. Perfect for developers, content creators, and SEO professionals looking to analyze on-page content at a glance.
